content: introducing the matcha cream crochet tote bag your next must make market bag it s the perfect blend of style function and fun a practical bag that s as enjoyable to make as it is to use whether you re heading to the farmers market the beach or just out and about this tote is the ultimate lightweight accessory for any season introducing the matcha cream crochet tote bag your next must make market bag it s the perfect blend of style function and fun a practical bag that s as enjoyable to make as it is to use whether you re heading to the farmers market the beach or just out and about this tote is the ultimate lightweight accessory for any season this pattern features a bottom-up construction with a beautiful mesh design accompanied by both written instructions and right and left-handed video tutorials for easy comprehension **materials needed-** hook 6mm us size 10 0 yarn vireo https //premier-yarns pxf io/c/342757/1583016/18076 u=https%3a%2f%2fwww premieryarns com%2fproducts%2fprvireo dk / sport weight 175 yards
